sentences.sContent: A number of stadiums were closed because of crowd disorder.
sentences.sCn: 因发生群众骚乱，一些体育场被关闭了。

sentences.sContent: His whole system was thrown into disorder.
sentences.sCn: 他的全套系统被搞得乱七八糟。

sentences.sContent: ...Goldberg calls the problem a disorder rather than a true addiction...
...and caring for a spouse with mental disorder can leave you with some of the same severe problems...

trans.tranOther: a situation in which a lot of people behave in an uncontrolled, noisy, or violent way in public
